diergo.spring.legacy

Class LegacyBeanMethodFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • diergo.spring.legacy.CustomizingTypeFilter<Method>
      • diergo.spring.legacy.LegacyBeanMethodFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartBeanDefinitionCustomizer, BeanDefinitionCustomizer, TypeFilter

    class LegacyBeanMethodFilter
extends CustomizingTypeFilter<Method>
    A type filter creating bean definitions for methods without parameters returning a valid bean type.
    See Also:
    MemberPredicates.withoutParameters(), MemberPredicates.returningBeanType(), LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessorBuilder.SingletonBuilder.methods(Predicate), LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessorBuilder.PrototypeBuilder.methods(Predicate)
